title: Enchant sapphire or opal

properties.name: description
properties.value: An enchant sapphire or opal tablet is the magic tablet version of the Lvl-1 Enchant spell. It can be used by any player to enchant sapphire or opal jewellery. Players with 7 Magic can create this item on any lectern with 1 cosmic rune, 1 water rune, and 1 soft clay, granting 17.5 Magic experience. This tablet can be made regardless of the player's current spellbook.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Enchant sapphire
This article is about the enchant tablet. For the enchant spell, see Lvl-1 Enchant.
Enchant sapphire or opal

Item ID8016

An enchant sapphire or opal tablet is the magic tablet version of the Lvl-1 Enchant spell. It can be used by any player to enchant sapphire or opal jewellery. Players with 7 Magic can create this item on any lectern with 1 cosmic rune, 1 water rune, and 1 soft clay, granting 17.5 Magic experience. This tablet can be made regardless of the player's current spellbook.

As with all magic tablets, using this tablet does not have a Magic level requirement but grants no experience.

The item will not enchant the Silvthrill rod in the quest In Aid of the Myreque.

[[File:Enchant sapphire or opal detail.png|left|100px]]
An '''enchant sapphire or opal''' tablet is the [[magic tablet]] version of the [[Lvl-1 Enchant]] spell. It can be used by any player to enchant [[sapphire]] or [[opal]] jewellery. Players with 7 [[Magic]] can create this item on any [[lectern]] with 1 [[cosmic rune]], 1 [[water rune]], and 1 [[soft clay]], granting 17.5 Magic [[experience]]. This tablet can be made regardless of the player's current [[spellbook]].

As with all magic tablets, using this tablet does not have a Magic level requirement but grants no experience.

The item will not enchant the [[Silvthrill rod]] in the quest [[In Aid of the Myreque]].
